summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5809 for the improvement of 5th Avenue Northeast, from East 85th Street to East 91st Street to East 96th Street Produced; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76587 as amended by Ordinance No. 76843, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
